objects.description: Some [Brave Prince](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0252) variants have used South  Korea's Daum email service to exfiltrate information, and later variants have posted the data to a web server via an HTTP post command.(Citation: McAfee Gold Dragon)

external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R., Saavedra-Morales, J. (2018, February 02). Gold Dragon Widens Olympics Malware Attacks, Gains Permanent Presence on Victims’ Systems. Retrieved June 6, 2018.
